response.original_title: Cast & crew IMDbPro  EnterFear: The Next Wave
response.overview: It's been one year since the tragic meteorite crash that spawned an army of the living dead to wreak havoc on the people of Jackson County. Now, it's back. But this time, it's not zombies they fear.
